roleset.name: fly through the air, travel via air
roleset.note: WING-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2, nonvehicle-51.4.2. Frames file for 'wing' based on Brown ULA.frame by Perryn (from wing.01-v)

example.name: attack
example.text: They had winged over the Adriatic, they had taken Bari by complete surprise and now they-1 were battering her, *T*-1 attacking with deadly skill.

roleset.name: make it up as you go
roleset.note: WING-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from wing.02-v)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Ok sounds good ! Or we can just wing it when we get there lol we do n't need to assign specific questions
